devdoc.details: A contract where users can buy grid cells with messages Each cell can be overwritten by paying more than the previous price All funds are stored in the contract vault

buyCell(uint256,string).details: Buy or overwrite a grid cell with a single character

params.cellId: The ID of the cell (0 to TOTAL_CELLS-1)
params.message: The single character to display in the cell (uppercase)

cellIdToCoordinates(uint256).details: Convert cell ID to x,y coordinates

constructor.details: Constructor sets the contract deployer as owner

coordinatesToCellId(uint256,uint256).details: Convert x,y coordinates to cell ID

getAllCells().details: Get all cell data for the entire grid

returns._0: An array of all grid cells

getMinimumPrice(uint256).details: Calculate minimum price to buy a cell

returns._0: The total CELO stored in the vault

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfer ownership to a new address

params.newOwner: The address of the new owner

updateMessage(uint256,string).details: Update character of a cell you own (free)

withdraw(uint256,address).details: Withdraw funds from the vault (owner only)

params.to: The address to send funds to

withdrawAll(address).details: Withdraw all funds from the vault (owner only)

params.to: The address to send funds to

devdoc.title: MessageVault
